languages.text: "Император, помилуй меня! Я сомневался прежде, но теперь вижу, что напрасно. Из всех защитников Простора лишь она была достойна стать щитом Его. Ее покаяние лишь доказывает это. Я был глупцом, когда не верил в нее. Неужели это — конец очищения Футфола?"

"Emperor, have mercy on me! I had doubts before, but now I see they were unwarranted. Of all defenders of the Expanse, only she was worthy of being His shield. Her repentance is but further proof of it. I was a fool to not believe in her. Is this how the cleansing of Footfall ends?"
languages.original_text: "Император, помилуй меня! Я сомневался прежде, но теперь вижу, что напрасно. Из всех защитников Простора лишь она была достойна стать щитом Его. Ее покаяние лишь доказывает это. Я был глупцом, когда не верил в нее. Неужели это — конец очищения Футфола?"

"Emperor, have mercy on me! I had doubts before, but now I see they were unwarranted. Of all defenders of the Expanse, only she was worthy of being His shield. Her repentance is but further proof of it. I was a fool to not believe in her. Is this how the cleansing of Footfall ends?"

languages.text: “帝皇陛下，请怜悯我吧！我以前也曾怀疑过，可现在我明白了，我的怀疑毫无缘由。在科罗努斯扩区所有的守护者之中，只有她值得成为帝皇的盾牌，她的忏悔就是最好的证明。我真的是太愚蠢了，我居然不相信她。难道落脚港的这场净化，就要这样结束了吗？”
languages.original_text: "Emperor, have mercy on me! I had doubts before, but now I see they were unwarranted. Of all defenders of the Expanse, only she was worthy of being His shield. Her repentance is but further proof of it. I was a fool to not believe in her. Is this how the cleansing of Footfall ends?"

traits.locale_text: “帝皇陛下，请怜悯我吧！我以前也曾怀疑过，可现在我明白了，我的怀疑毫无缘由。在科罗努斯扩区所有的守护者之中，只有她值得成为帝皇的盾牌，她的忏悔就是最好的证明。我真的是太愚蠢了，我居然不相信她。难道落脚港的这场净化，就要这样结束了吗？”

languages.text: 「皇帝よ、私に慈悲を！以前は迷いがありましたが、今ではそんなの無用だと気が付きました。エクスパンスを守る者の中で、彼女だけが皇帝の盾となるにふさわしい。彼女の悔い改めを見ていれば分かります。彼女の事を信頼していなかったなんて、私はとても無知でした。これがフットフォール浄化の終わりでしょうか？」
languages.original_text: "Emperor, have mercy on me! I had doubts before, but now I see they were unwarranted. Of all defenders of the Expanse, only she was worthy of being His shield. Her repentance is but further proof of it. I was a fool to not believe in her. Is this how the cleansing of Footfall ends?"

traits.locale_text: 「皇帝よ、私に慈悲を！以前は迷いがありましたが、今ではそんなの無用だと気が付きました。エクスパンスを守る者の中で、彼女だけが皇帝の盾となるにふさわしい。彼女の悔い改めを見ていれば分かります。彼女の事を信頼していなかったなんて、私はとても無知でした。これがフットフォール浄化の終わりでしょうか？」

languages.text: «Emperador, tenga piedad de mí! Antes tenía dudas, pero ahora veo que eran injustificadas. De todos los defensores de la Extensión, solo ella era digna de ser Su escudo. Su arrepentimiento es una prueba más de ello. Fui tonto al no creer en ella. ¿Es así como acaba la limpieza de Paso?».
languages.original_text: "Emperor, have mercy on me! I had doubts before, but now I see they were unwarranted. Of all defenders of the Expanse, only she was worthy of being His shield. Her repentance is but further proof of it. I was a fool to not believe in her. Is this how the cleansing of Footfall ends?"

traits.locale_text: «Emperador, tenga piedad de mí! Antes tenía dudas, pero ahora veo que eran injustificadas. De todos los defensores de la Extensión, solo ella era digna de ser Su escudo. Su arrepentimiento es una prueba más de ello. Fui tonto al no creer en ella. ¿Es así como acaba la limpieza de Paso?».

languages.text: "Imperator, habt Gnade! Ich hatte Zweifel, doch nun sehe ich, dass sie unbegründet waren. Von allen Verteidigern der Ausdehnung war allein sie würdig, sein Schild zu sein. Ihre Reue ist nur ein weiterer Beweis dafür. Ich war ein Narr, ihr nicht zu glauben. Soll die Läuterung von Footfall so enden?"
languages.original_text: "Emperor, have mercy on me! I had doubts before, but now I see they were unwarranted. Of all defenders of the Expanse, only she was worthy of being His shield. Her repentance is but further proof of it. I was a fool to not believe in her. Is this how the cleansing of Footfall ends?"

traits.locale_text: "Imperator, habt Gnade! Ich hatte Zweifel, doch nun sehe ich, dass sie unbegründet waren. Von allen Verteidigern der Ausdehnung war allein sie würdig, sein Schild zu sein. Ihre Reue ist nur ein weiterer Beweis dafür. Ich war ein Narr, ihr nicht zu glauben. Soll die Läuterung von Footfall so enden?"

languages.text: « Ô Empereur, ayez pitié de moi ! J'avais des doutes, mais je réalise maintenant qu'ils étaient totalement infondés. De tous les défenseurs des Étendues, elle seule était digne d'être Son bouclier et son repentir en est la preuve. J'ai été stupide de ne pas croire en elle. Est-ce ainsi que s'achève la purification de Castel ? »
languages.original_text: "Emperor, have mercy on me! I had doubts before, but now I see they were unwarranted. Of all defenders of the Expanse, only she was worthy of being His shield. Her repentance is but further proof of it. I was a fool to not believe in her. Is this how the cleansing of Footfall ends?"

traits.locale_text: « Ô Empereur, ayez pitié de moi ! J'avais des doutes, mais je réalise maintenant qu'ils étaient totalement infondés. De tous les défenseurs des Étendues, elle seule était digne d'être Son bouclier et son repentir en est la preuve. J'ai été stupide de ne pas croire en elle. Est-ce ainsi que s'achève la purification de Castel ? »

languages.text: "İmparator, bana merhamet et! Önceden şüphe içindeydim ama artık bu şüphelerin yersiz olduğunu görebiliyorum. Enginlik'in tüm savunucuları içinde O'nun kalkanı olmaya layık tek kişi İncendia idi. Ettiği tövbe bunu daha da kanıtlar nitelikte. İncendia'ya inanmayarak aptallık ettim. Binliman'ın arındırılması bu şekilde son mu buluyor?"
languages.original_text: "Emperor, have mercy on me! I had doubts before, but now I see they were unwarranted. Of all defenders of the Expanse, only she was worthy of being His shield. Her repentance is but further proof of it. I was a fool to not believe in her. Is this how the cleansing of Footfall ends?"
